comments.author: Christian Stocker
comments.body: Patch is attached, which solves the issue

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Merged to the 2.2 branch in revision 1071665 and to the 2.1 branch in revision 1071667.

description: If a node returns null for Node.getNamespaceUri(), but Namespace.EMPTY_NAMESPACE expects an empty string, the comparison fails. But to my knowledge a null and "" namespaceUri should be treated the same.
summary: Namespace comparison in Namespace.java doesn't work, if a node return null, but it expects an empty string
